• Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game with procedurally generated worlds.
  • Players can mine resources, upgrade equipment, build structures, and trade with others in real-time.
  • The game features a day/night cycle, dynamic weather, and a station for buying upgrades and selling ores.
  • Mobile controls and touch support are available, along with customizable keybindings.
  • Saves are stored locally with optional cloud sync via Puter for cross-device access.

Mega Miner Online is a multiplayer mining game where players explore procedurally generated worlds, mine resources, upgrade equipment, and trade with others in real-time. The game features a day/night cycle, dynamic weather, and a station for buying upgrades and selling ores. Mobile controls and touch support are available, along with customizable keybindings. Saves are stored locally with optional cloud sync via Puter for cross-device access.
